title: Whats this new update for?
body:
I already patched to 6.15 so don't assume its that.

About 3 hours prior to making this post, I logged out of league to play Diablo 3. After finishing many mob waves I signed out and went back to league.
The client started scanning the files then started updating.

Why is it updating and what did it change/add to the game?

Plz Rito HELP! My curiosity is making me feed
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: Most likely has to do with the crashes that were going on earlier since the warning for that is gone.

> [{quoted}](name=Warlord Zudane,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=0o6Aswwc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-28T07:34:44.376+0000)
>
> Most likely has to do with the crashes that were going on earlier since the warning for that is gone.

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=0o6Aswwc,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-07-28T08:04:03.926+0000)
>
> The patch was to fix the loading screen crash bug.

thx guys

*Warlord Zudane* is correct. The patch was a quick fix for some of the issues that were in the service status tracker. Any game you were in should have been unrecorded or ended in a draw. 

Let me know if you have any additional questions.
If the patch was for the crashing, it didn't work. I'm still having problems.
The patch was to fix the loading screen crash bug.
